Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'After some deliberation, Teddy eventually accepts the extra gift.'}
{3: 'Kiske hurried back to join his friends, while Teddy enthusiastically tinkers with the new collectible in her hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Storing stuff in such an ancient way... It's indeed a rare find.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, why did you delete that program?', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hmm? You're still thinking about that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just feel like you worked hard on it...', 3: '11'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Because it lacks a soul.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Music's gotta have souls. Putting things together like that might trick someone at first, but if you listen carefully, there's no real depth to it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "If it's all about flaunting techniques, that's not what I'd call a musical piece.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I see.', 3: '18', 4: "It's the first time I've heard that.", 5: '18'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Actually, I've done something similar before... Don't tell anyone.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I won't.", 3: '21', 4: "I absolutely won't.", 5: '21'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've dropped a few algorithm-generated tracks anonymously on the Babylonia forum in the past.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'No electronic music software, instruments, or vocals—just straight-up calculated products from algorithm programs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Initially, they got quite some praise, but then I started to feel...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'It was all about mechanical techniques, nothing like the real music.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Stuff like that shouldn't be churned out by algorithms... I see it as a cringeworthy chapter in my history, if you ask me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "This is just between us, okay? Don't tell anyone else!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She warns you with a stern gaze.'}
{3: 'She appears to be in a pleasant mood, humming a tuneless little song as she resumes fiddling with her new collectible.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hmm? Is there anything else?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Has today's schedule been completely changed?", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The transport stress test...!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly recalling the original plan, Teddy exhibits a panicked expression seldom seen on her face.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Oh crap...! Kiske!! Lend me your ride!!!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'She grabs your hand and sprints toward the door.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{3: "Despite having Kiske's electric vehicle, the two of you still fail to reach the initially planned event on Teddy's schedule."}
{3: 'When you walk out of the testing center, it is already afternoon. Teddy has swapped out of the Golden Age coating, lazily slumping on a nearby bench.'}
{3: 'The beach lies right next to the testing center, with a refreshing sea breeze wafting through the city.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "In the end, we still didn't make it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We just missed one transport craft.', 3: '56'}
{3: 'You have already talked to the staff at the testing center. They will notify you ahead of time when the next transport craft is prepared for departure.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I just hate it when my plan gets twisted up like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: "But hey, you've also gained something unexpected.", 3: '60'}
{3: 'Deviating from the plan, she chose to help Kiske and unexpectedly acquired the friendship and gifts from awakened machines.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...You're right. I did end up with a new collectible that I didn't expect.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Taking out that ancient collectible, Teddy once again starts tinkering with it attentively.'}
{2: 'What exactly is this?', 3: '65'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's something from way before the Golden Age, known as a Walkman.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I had to dig through a lot of data to confirm that. They must have passed by something like an electronic museum on their journey to get their hands on such an ancient artifact.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's probably... something you can carry around to listen to music.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'It came with these wired earphones and a cassette tape. I guess this is how people from way back before the Golden Age used to record music.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You can't just skip back and replay a part whenever you want... There's something oddly romantic about that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Yeah, not being able to replay at will means you have to really listen to every single note.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'These tapes can get damaged if you rewind them too much.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct meticulously arranges the black semi-transparent tape.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The awakened machines had them well preserved... I think I can get it up and running again with just a few tweaks.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Concentrating on the minuscule components, the pink-haired Construct retrieves some tools from her pocket and makes a few adjustments.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'That should do...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Want to try it together, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "This is also an unexpected item that wasn't on the agenda.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds good.', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'It might not come as a surprise but a letdown, though...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you know it, the pink-haired girl moves closer and inserts one end of the wired headphones into your ear.'}
{2: "Is this how it's supposed to work?", 3: '89'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Following the ancient instructions... it should be.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bowing her head, she delicately presses the "Play" button.'}
{3: 'A faint sound of electromagnetic interference emanates from the earphones.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Is the tape broken...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before her words fade, a gentle, never-before-heard melody slowly flows out from the earphones.'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct lets out a soft sigh, settling down beside you as you are now linked by the earphones.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'This could also pass as... an unplanned surprise, I guess.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Naturally.', 3: '102', 4: "It's quite a surprise.", 5: '102'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hmm... It turned out to be a pretty nice trip.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gazes at the distant sea, revealing a satisfied smile.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia'}
{3: 'To express her gratitude, Teddy decides to escort you all the way to your lounge.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Just so you know, for a technician like me, this is pretty much the highest level of thanks I can give.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Since we've made it this far, want to come in and sit for a bit?", 3: '114'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Of course, I wouldn't say no to such a sincere invitation from you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{3: 'Upon entering the lounge, Teddy seems to have recalled something before taking out a gift box that you find familiar.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Oh, I almost forgot... When I was here last time, I thought you could use something like this.', 5: '1'}
{2: 'What is this?', 3: '122', 4: 'Is it... what you asked Kiske to find?', 5: '124'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I thought you had a better memory... That's the payment I got from Kiske for my labor.", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Go ahead and open it.', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct sits back on the couch, watching you with her arms crossed.'}
{3: 'Opening the messily wrapped gift box, you discover a small speaker inside.'}
{3: "It's probably a relic from the Golden Age. Despite its age, it still appears to be functional."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Given your role as a commandant, you probably can't wear big headphones all the time.", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, how about using this to listen to some music every now and then?', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'll tweak it for you so it can connect to your terminal...", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you.', 3: '141', 4: "Can't the terminal also play music...?", 5: '139'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You've got zero taste, seriously.", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'This speaker brand is known for its distinct sound quality. No regular terminal can even come close to comparing.', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I noticed last time that this spot on your desk here has just the right amount of room to squeeze it in...', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Pressing the button on the speaker, she squints as clear, crisp music emanates from it.'}
{2: 'It does sound different.', 3: '146', 4: 'Sounds beautiful.', 5: '146'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Obviously.', 5: '1'}
{2: 'By the way, have you finished restoring that model?', 3: '149'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Can't you just not bring that up at a time like this?", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's break time right now...", 5: '1'}
{3: 'She opens the repaired terminal with a disgruntled face.'}
{2: 'So, it was all faked, right?', 3: '156'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Didn't you have fun, too?", 5: '1'}
{2: 'After work is done,', 3: '159'}
{2: 'how about I treat you to some cherry-flavored electrolyte?', 3: '160'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Heh, that's more like it.", 5: '1'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct, sporting a mischievous smile, lounges on the couch while gazing at you.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's a deal, then.", 5: '1'}
{3: 'While the soft music plays, the glow of dusk seeps through the window, and the gentle evening breeze delicately blows open the curtains.'}
{3: 'The dim light seems to have prolonged the duration of this sunset.'}
{3: "The tape cannot be rewound, and the clock's hands cannot turn back."}
{3: 'Each moment of this serene dusk is worthy of being cherished.'}
